title: Healthcare Competency Strengthening: Short-Term Hybrid Professional Skill Development Program for Nurses

context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Participants complete over 90% of weekly core nursing theories through a mobile microlearning platform
Participants achieve over 80% of simulation evaluation criteria in face-to-face workshops
Participants write case reports applying learning content to practical tasks within three days after training

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
